entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rockglen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rockglen 10:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -19.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -24.6°C
Wind: SSE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow at times. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 in the morning then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
